committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of the month of May 1975 as Older Americans Month.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to designate the month of May 1975 as "Older Americans Month", calling upon all citizens to recognize the valuable contributions of older Americans in our society.

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of the month of May 1975 as Older Americans Month.
